query_user_info.sql: SELECT user_id, user_name, mobile, id_card, create_time FROM user_info WHERE mobile = '{mobile}' OR id_card = '{id_card}' LIMIT 100

query_credit_info.sql: SELECT id, guarantor_loan_no, loan_apply_no, open_id, order_type, loan_purpose, term, repay_method, order_status, order_desc, apply_time, apply_status, apply_channel, cap_code, product_no, hq_examine_time, zf_examine_time, create_time, update_time, module_type FROM cfloan_biz.hl_loan_app_info WHERE guarantor_loan_no = {guarantor_loan_no} LIMIT 100

query_loan_info.sql: SELECT id, user_id, loan_no, guarantor_loan_no, loan_apply_no, cap_loan_no, busi_date, busi_date_ym, first_term_date, first_overdue_days, first_overdue_amt, pay_time, pay_date, due_date, paid_off_date, loan_amt, loan_term, loan_status, compensate_status, paid_principal, paid_int_fee, paid_handling_fee, paid_svc_fee, paid_late_fee, paid_overdue_fee, paid_guaranteed_fee, repay_type, year_rate, cap_rate, asset_side, cap_code, product_no, channel, guaranteed_rate, equity_fee, funding_party, create_time, update_time, overdue_days, top_overdue_term, hist_overdue_nums, hist_overdue_count, unpaid_principal, overdue_unpaid_principal, buy_back, buy_back_date, reduction_principal, reduction_interest, reduction_fee, reduction_overdue_interest, reduction_penalty_fee, reduction_guaranteed_fee, module_type, order_status, order_paid_off_date, paid_other_fee, reduction_other_fee, guaranteed_other_fee_rate, alter_comp_principal, today_guaranteed_fee_total, last_loan_balance_change_date, comp_principal, extension_status, extension_date, amc_flag FROM cfloan_biz.hl_loan_info WHERE guarantor_loan_no = '{guarantor_loan_no}' LIMIT 100

query_repay_info.sql: SELECT id, product_no, loan_no, guarantor_loan_no, loan_apply_no, cap_loan_no, trans_date, trans_date_ymd, repay_end_date, install_term, repay_type, repayment_type, repayment_state, repay_amt, repay_principal, repay_interest, repay_fee, repay_overdue_interest, repay_penalty_fee, due_repay_amt, due_repay_principal, due_repay_interest, due_repay_fee, due_repay_overdue_interest, due_repay_penalty_fee, reduction_amt, reduction_principal, reduction_interest, reduction_fee, reduction_overdue_interest, reduction_penalty_fee, repay_seq_no, repay_behavior, order_status, create_time, update_time, repay_other_fee, due_repay_other_fee, reduction_other_fee FROM cfloan_biz.hl_repay_record WHERE ggg = '{ggg}' LIMIT 100
